page.title: 16A WEEKEND WITH SAMANTHA
page.content: Every Friday my brother and I stay overnight at my grandparents' house.On Saturday morning we have breakfast at 8 o'clock,usually cereal,toast and tea or orange juice.Then we go swimming. My little brother who is 5 is being taught to swim by Papa and Gran. He wears a plastic ring round his waist to keep him afloat.After our swim Papa takes us home and we have lunch with Mum and Dad which is usually a meaty sandwich and a glass of milk.Saturday afternoon is spent with our other grandparents.We have dinner at night in our own home then we watch television until bedtime. On Sunday I read or play games with my little brother. In the summer we go down to the boat which is berthed in Maidens harbour.
